```{r setup}
library(waterquality)
library(dplyr)
```

## Load the packaged dataset

```{r}
data("yarra_wq", package = "waterquality")
dplyr::glimpse(yarra_wq)

```


## A quick look at one parameter over time


```{r}
target <- unique(yarra_wq$parameter)[1]
yr_mean <- yarra_wq |>
dplyr::filter(parameter == target) |>
dplyr::group_by(year) |>
dplyr::summarise(mean_value = mean(value, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")
plot(mean_value ~ year, data = yr_mean, type = "b",
xlab = "Year", ylab = "Mean value")

```



## Launch the Shiny app

```{r, eval=FALSE}
waterquality::run_app()

```
